original: BRAHMER, Henry Teodor, överingenjör, Rotebro, f London 25/6 84 av skräddarm Teod Persson o Elise Nilsson, gm Ruth Svensk. Studex NReal 02, ex KTH (kemi) 07. Ing Örebro pappersbr AB:s sulfatcell- ul.fabr 07—08, St Kopparb Bergsl AB:s celluls.fabr :r Härnäs 08—14, övering Nensjö cellul.AB:s sulfatcellul.fabr Sprängsviken 14— 20, övering sed 20 o styr.led Sv jästfabriks AB Sthlm. Offic sakk.uppdr. Led Sv Tekn.frn sed. 04, styr.led dess avd f kemi o bergsvetensk 25—28, v ordf där 32 o ordf 33, led frns styr 33—34; styr.led Mell o N Sv ång-pannefrn, Stat inst f folkhälsan, v:a vägdistr, ordf Sollentuna luftsk.frn. Av trycket: Tekn art i Tekn Tidskr, Sv Papperstidn, Sv Kem Tidskr. LIVA.
translated: BRAHMER, Henry Teodor, chief engineer, Rotebro, b. London 25/6 1884 to tailor Teod Persson and Elise Nilsson, m. Ruth Svensk. Studied at NReal 1902, graduated from KTH (Chemistry) 1907. Worked at Örebro Pappersbr AB's sulfate cellulose factory 1907-1908, at St Kopparb Bergsl AB's cellulose factory in Härnäs 1908-1914, chief engineer at Nensjö Cellul AB's sulfate cellulose factory in Sprängsviken 1914-1920. Became chief engineer in 1920 and served on the board of directors of Sv Jästfabriks AB in Stockholm. Official consultant since 1904, served on the board of the chemistry and mining science department of the Swedish Engineers' Union from 1925 to 1928, vice chairman in 1932 and chairman in 1933. Member of the board from 1933 to 1934. Board member of the Central and Northern Swedish Steam Boiler Association, the National Institute of Public Health, and chairman of Sollentuna air protection association. Published technical articles in Tekn Tidskr, Sv Papperstidn, and Sv Kem Tidskr. Lives in...
